env.info: (hold 0) (plate 0) (at 0 4) (sort 1 couch) (size 1 big) (at 1 1) (sort 2 bed) (size 2 big) (at 2 2) (sort 3 table) (size 3 big) (at 3 3) (sort 4 desk) (size 4 big) (at 4 4) (sort 5 washmachine) (size 5 big) (at 5 5) (type 5 container) (closed 5) (sort 6 refrigerator) (size 6 big) (at 6 6) (type 6 container) (closed 6) (sort 8 book) (size 8 small) (color 8 red) (sort 9 book) (size 9 small) (color 9 blue) (inside 9 6) (sort 10 book) (size 10 small) (color 10 green) (sort 11 cup) (size 11 small) (color 11 red) (sort 12 cup) (size 12 small) (color 12 blue) (sort 13 cup) (size 13 small) (color 13 green) (at 13 3) (sort 14 can) (size 14 small) (color 14 white) (sort 15 can) (size 15 small) (color 15 black) (at 15 1)

test.instr: (:ins (:cons_notnot (:info (on X Y) (:cond (sort X can) (color X black) (sort Y couch)))) (:cons_notnot (:info (inside X Y) (:cond (sort X book) (color X black) (sort Y refrigerator)))) (:cons_not (:task (goto X) (:cond (sort X couch)))) (:cons_notnot (:info (closed X) (:cond (sort X washmachine)))) (:cons_not (:task (goto X) (:cond (sort X table)))) (:cons_not (:task (pickup X) (:cond (sort X book) (color X green)))) (:task (goto X) (:cond (sort X bed))) (:task (pickup X) (:cond (sort X cup))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X book) (sort Y couch))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X can) (sort Y couch))) )
test.nl:
The black can must be on couch. The black can must be in refrigerator. Do not go to couch. There must be the washmachine is closed. Do not go to the table. Do not pick up the green book. Go to bed. Pick up a cup. Put the book on couch. Put the can on couch.
Put the red cup in the refrigerator. Put the green cup on the table.
